 1: <?php
 2: 
 3: namespace Ease\JQuery;
 4: 
 5: /**
 6:  * jQuery UI common class.
 7:  *
 8:  * @author Vitex <vitex@hippy.cz>
 9:  */
10: class UIPart extends Part
11: {
12:     public function __construct()
13:     {
14:         parent::__construct();
15:         self::jQueryze();
16:     }
17: 
18:     /**
19:      * Opatří objekt vším potřebným pro funkci jQueryUI.
20:      *
21:      * @param \Ease\Page|mixed $EaseObject objekt k opatření jQuery závislostmi
22:      */
23:     public static function jQueryze()
24:     {
25:         parent::jQueryze();
26:         $webPage = \Ease\Shared::webPage();
27:         $webPage->includeJavaScript('jquery-ui/jquery-ui.js', 1, true);
28:         $jQueryUISkin = \Ease\Shared::instanced()->getConfigValue('jQueryUISkin');
29:         if ($jQueryUISkin) {
30:             $webPage->includeCss('jquery-ui-themes/'.self::getSkinName().'/jquery-ui.css',
31:                 true);
32:         } else {
33:             $webPage->includeCss('jquery-ui/css/smoothness/jquery-ui.css', true);
34:         }
35:     }
36: 
37:     /**
38:      * Vrací název aktuálně používaného jQueryUI skinu.
39:      *
40:      * @return type
41:      */
42:     public static function getSkinName()
43:     {
44:         $jQueryUISkin = \Ease\Shared::instanced()->getConfigValue('jQueryUISkin');
45:         if ($jQueryUISkin) {
46:             return $jQueryUISkin;
47:         } else {
48:             if (isset(\Ease\Shared::webPage()->jQueryUISkin)) {
49:                 return \Ease\Shared::webPage()->jQueryUISkin;
50:             }
51:         }
52: 
53:         return;
54:     }
55: }
56:
